verses.roman:
yo bhavet komala-śraddhaḥ
sa kaniṣṭho nigadyate

synonyms: yaḥ—anyone who; bhavet—may be; komala—soft; śraddhaḥ—having faith; saḥ—such a person; kaniṣṭhaḥ—neophyte devotee; nigadyate—is said to be.
translation: " 'One whose faith is not very strong, who is just beginning, should be considered a neophyte devotee.'

purport.content: This verse also appears in the Bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhu (1.2.19).
